body:
Normandy has been running for a while without any issue, and this isn't an issue that we have run into so far. Considering that we have a lot of disparate recipes now, and disabling recipes tends to interrupt data collection in irreparable ways, I think that a mass-disable would likely cause more damage than simply disabling individual recipes.

Because of all this, I'm going to close this as WONTFIX, but I'm open to revisiting the issue in the future.
